title: [BUG] SkiaSharp vendors libwebp vulnerable to CVE-2023-4863
body:
### Description

SkiaSharp vendors (via mono/skia) a version of libwebp that is vulnerable to CVE-2023-4863.

Upstream skia picked up the fixed libwebp via https://github.com/google/skia/commit/1176deb1ac552f05092be69fc30b49245bb9f897

Please:
1. Update mono's skia fork.
2. Release a new SkiaSharp version which isn't vulnerable to CVE-2023-4863 anymore.
3. Update the GHSA for CVE-2023-4863 (https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-j7hp-h8jx-5ppr) so that dependents get alerted of the vulnerability in SkiaSharp. (Happy to take care of that myself otherwise when a new release is available)

Thank you!
